companies.name: Sieri Poro Farm
companies.descShort: A reindeer farm in the middle of Lapland just 20 minutes from Rovaniemi by a car. The best reindeer experience possible in  beautiful surrounding of one of the last family farms in this area.
companies.descLong: More details about particular farms, activities and rules during them

companies.name: SoulMate Huskies
companies.descShort: Husky farm located hour and a half from Lapish city Rovaniemi providing husky tours in a home like conditions. This farm is not like any other because of the family spirit of the whole place.
companies.descLong: More details about particular farms, activities and rules during them
